attributes.review: I work in tech and have made apps before. I’m embarrassed by this app and it’s inabilities and the unstable platform. This shouldn’t have been launched until complete testing was done. Someone had better own the faults for this. How can I support trump as president if his team of people can’t even launch an app. He’s supposed to be a business man. Come on.

attributes.review: This app is terrible. I got it to see what the future would hold if Cheeto became president in 2020. I am highly disappointed in what America would become. Also every time I would open the app it would log me out of my phone for half an hour. So overall, I am disappointed in the app and even more so in the “president” with corn husk hair.✨

attributes.review: I’ve been trying to download this app since last year... as soon as it did download the very next day things started getting weird. I came home to see my beloved cat 😿 hanging from my shower head with “trump 2020” written in her blood !!! 💔✨ the culprit was obvious as there was small foot prints covered in cheeto dust leading to and from the crime scene.... do not download unless u want all ur cats murdered!!!! 😢😢😢
attributes.title: NASTY DISGUSTING THE WORST 😕🔥

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in order to support the PrEsIdeNt of the US. Only to find out he’s a big racist, that hates people and wishes he was Hitler. Anyone that puts his own self above the life of others is no good for America. I was spammed with notifications after turning them off, and I feel as if the app is tracking my data. This app needs to be taken down.

I had to delete 100 photos of my grandchildren, ginny and ron, to download this application. I have to say that I’m quite disappointed with the display of the application as well. Even though I am a huge supporter of our president, this app isn’t very good. I’d rather stick to the text reminders.
